subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mary Garber, one of the country’s first female sportswriters, died Sunday in Winston-Salem, N.C. She was 92. Her death was announced by Rose Rush, a long-time friend whose father was an editor at The Winston-Salem Journal.
snippet: Mary Garber, one of the country’s first female sportswriters, died Sunday in Winston-Salem, N.C. She was 92. Her death was announced by Rose Rush, a long-time friend whose father was an editor at The Winston-Salem Journal.
